page.title: 04LIFE STYLES C. CROOKHAM
page.content: Answers to a questionaire show that the population of this area is mobile and that this is related to employment {1/4}of fathers of junior school children are in the Armed Forces.{2/3} of the total live in this area because they were posted here or because it is convenient for their work.Only {1/10} were born or brought up here.{2/3}of the total work within twenty miles of home.{4/5}travel to work by car.Nearly half of the parents have lived in this area for less than five years.Nearly half of the total expected to move again {1/3}of the total expected to move within two years.{1/3}of the total have changed jobs since they came to live in the area and {1/3}have moved house within the area.There is a high level of employment among mothers of school children.{2/3}of those who work do so part time, {1/4}voluntary.
